channel.title: Crown Mix up Please help!
channel.description:
When Admins and owners talk on my server they have the mod crown and the mods have the admin crown. How can i make it so Owners have the owner crown and admins and mods have the right crowns.
I mainly just want to know what file do i edit this in? So this is in public chat on a 317 PI server. Please help.

item.title: Crown Mix up Please help!

@Mattiaspope wrote:

I just wanted to know what file/s i edit this in.
